channel.title: Stop playing runescape! look here!
channel.description:
IF you're going to play a free MMORPG on the internet it might as well be a good one.
Check this game out, it's gone completely free awhile ago (that included the 2 expansions that came with it)
The community is still great, and it's really easy to level up to the highest level... and get right into the PVP of the game.
[url=http://chronicle.ubi.com]chronicles.ubi.com[/url]

item.title: Stop playing runescape! look here!
item.dc:creator: @kurt pixels
item.description:
@kurt wrote:

the fu superior:

Oh, thanks but there is no way im waiting that long again, maybe another time.

Well, to activate your account for FREE…

All you have to do is log onto this site with your username/pass and it gives you all 3 games, and the special races for free. YOU HAVE TO LOG ONTO THIS SITE FOR YOUR UBI.COM account to work.

https://secure.ubi.com/billing/

https://secure.ubi.com/billing/

https://secure.ubi.com/billing/

Read full topic

item.title: Stop playing runescape! look here!
item.dc:creator: @kurt pixels
item.description:
@kurt wrote:

the fu superior:

damn this, i waited for ever for it to finish and when i logged in it sayed i needed to subscribe

Ok, when you start the SB client… There is a thing that says account management next to settings, you click that and it opens up a ubi.com website that gives you a serial code that lets you access the game for COMPLETELY FREE!.. I’ll have to make a tutorial to do this… it’s kinda complicated…

BUT IT IS FREE OR I WOULDN’T BE PLAYING IT RIGHT NOW.

Read full topic

item.title: Stop playing runescape! look here!
item.dc:creator: @kurt pixels
item.description:
@kurt wrote:

the fu superior:

u have to pay for file planet

I’m going to have to make a guide as how to sign up for this…

Miss Silabsoft:

imho rs pvp is still alot of fun its a pain in the butt at times but i personally got the same enjoyment as wow pvp

Yeah, but to enjoy either of these games you must pay to play. Shadowbane is completely free and at the cost of following instructions on the site you to can play for free! The best part about this game is the freakin’ pvp, and until someone tries this game and messages me on Redemption server, I’m going to keep saying how fun it is to be in a 200v200 person battle (or more) You actually lose cities that are important to your nation that other players build, take over mines… It’s the best PVP I’ve ever played… ever… 12 races / over 35 different classes… sure wow is great, but for a FREE game this rules… What other game can you actually become the king of the server… literly? And run everything? None.

Read full topic
